text: TriMet is the transit system in Portland Oregon. It was formed in 1969, and has since become the primary transit provider in the Portland Metropolitan Area. == Service == TriMet has 3 main modes of transit * Bus service: 85 local, express, and bus rapid transit lines. * Light rail: 5 MAX light rail lines. * Commuter rail: the WES commuter rail line. TriMet also runs a paratransit service called "LIFT". == References == Category:Portland, Oregon
title: TriMet
